price: Hudi (nyakugira amahoro y’Imana Allah) yarihanije abantu yarungitsweko ati: “Mu vy’ukuri, jewe ndatinya ko mwoshikirwa n’ibihano vy’Imana Allah ku musi uhambaye, mu gihe mworendegera mu bugarariji, mwihakana n’inema zayo”.
arabic: إِنِّيٓ أَخَافُ عَلَيۡكُمۡ عَذَابَ يَوۡمٍ عَظِيمٖ

meta.transliteration: innī akhāfu ʿalaykum ʿadhāba yawmin ʿaẓīmin
